name: Erebus' Playground
description:
Elder God Flight Sim / Aim Trainer

"There's Definitely a Knack To It" - Tadg

"Man I Suck At PC Controls" - Jamie

Lonely old Erebus, entity of entropy, dreams an endless dream of rending our physical plane to naught but an empty void. A sombre yet thrilling prospect for the young and old god, awaiting the real thing. Dream long and dream peacefully Erebus, we won't blame you when you wake, all good dreams must come to an end

Created for the Mini Jam #67: Void

Shoot as many targets within the time limit, destroying a star with a dyson swarm around it & flying through will net you more time. Be weary as you time bonuses will decrease the longer you dream, drawing you closer and closer to waking.

Space: Fly forwards

Left Mouse Button: Destroy stars

Right Mouse Button: Use Star Hook

ESC: Quit Game
